title: Someone just literally afk'd in my game sat in base for 15 minutes while there rq'ing :)
body:
Riot does nothing to intentional afk'ers :) Riot is a joke
LUL nobody will do anything for these players :D why would they.

replies.body: UPDATE: just got a message saying a player reported was dealt with! GOOD JOB Mods you're gods!

> [{quoted}](name=Lökí,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=OFE7eAn2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-03T21:35:28.592+0000)
>
> UPDATE: just got a message saying a player reported was dealt with! GOOD JOB Mods you're gods!

AFKing doesn't get a pop-up message. It's handled by leaverbuster.

Sometimes it wont happen immediately. Reports are more often than not stored for future reference and when enough evidence of wrong doing against a player is accumulated action will be taken. Otherwise it is on us to notify riot when something happens that needs to be looked at. They will decide if it warrants action or not.
